# Schedule

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Install and load required packages
if (!requireNamespace("dplyr", quietly = TRUE)) {
  install.packages("dplyr", quiet = TRUE)
}
if (!requireNamespace("kableExtra", quietly = TRUE)) {
  install.packages("kableExtra", quiet = TRUE)
}

# Load libraries with explicit namespace
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(dplyr)
  library(kableExtra)
})

# Read CSV with proper handling
data <- read.csv("sched_basic.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE, check.names = TRUE)

# Check if dplyr is properly loaded
if (!exists("mutate", mode = "function")) {
  library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
}

# Create the table data
table_data <- data %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    Time = paste0(time_start, "-", time_end),
    Speaker = ifelse(is.na(Speaker) | Speaker == "", "", Speaker),
    Topic = ifelse(is.na(Topic) | Topic == "", "", Topic),
    Event = event,
    # Create clickable links for talks with abstracts
    Title = case_when(
      grepl("Stator.*single cell data", Title, ignore.case = TRUE) ~
        paste0('<a href="abstracts/ava-keynote.html">', Title, '</a>'),
      grepl("GeneWeaver 3", Title, ignore.case = TRUE) ~
        paste0('<a href="abstracts/kevin-talk.html">', Title, '</a>'),
      grepl("Cell-specific action potential", Title, ignore.case = TRUE) ~
        paste0('<a href="abstracts/cardiology-talk.html">', Title, '</a>'),
      grepl("Patient-Specific Multiscale Modelling of Glioblastoma", Title, ignore.case = TRUE) ~
        paste0('<a href="abstracts/glioblastoma-talk.html">', Title, '</a>'),
      grepl("A tRNA regulatory nexus", Title, ignore.case = TRUE) ~
        paste0('<a href="abstracts/trna-talk.html">', Title, '</a>'),
      grepl("Rectal cancer.*spatial single-cell", Title, ignore.case = TRUE) ~
        paste0('<a href="abstracts/rectal-cancer-talk.html">', Title, '</a>'),
      grepl("DOMAINet.*Domain-Oriented", Title, ignore.case = TRUE) ~
        paste0('<a href="abstracts/domainnet-talk.html">', Title, '</a>'),
      grepl("Viro3D.*comprehensive database", Title, ignore.case = TRUE) ~
        paste0('<a href="abstracts/viro3d-talk.html">', Title, '</a>'),
      grepl("Making Sense of Big Data.*MetaAtlas", Title, ignore.case = TRUE) ~
        paste0('<a href="abstracts/metaatlas-talk.html">', Title, '</a>'),
      grepl("Spatially Resolved Single Cell Analysis.*Bevacizumab", Title, ignore.case = TRUE) ~
        paste0('<a href="abstracts/ram-keynote-spatial.html">', Title, '</a>'),
      grepl("Marine microbial biodiscovery", Title, ignore.case = TRUE) ~
        paste0('<a href="abstracts/kate-keynote.html">', Title, '</a>'),
      grepl("AI Driven Models.*Flare Risk.*RA", Title, ignore.case = TRUE) ~
        paste0('<a href="abstracts/ra-flare-prediction.html">', Title, '</a>'),
      grepl("Performance Comparison.*Statistical Emulators", Title, ignore.case = TRUE) ~
        paste0('<a href="abstracts/statistical-emulators.html">', Title, '</a>'),
      grepl("Multi-omics Cancer Subtyping Hackathon", Title, ignore.case = TRUE) ~
        paste0('<a href="abstracts/cancer-subtyping-hackathon.html">', Title, '</a>'),
      grepl("The Virus Genome Toolkit.*V-gTK", Title, ignore.case = TRUE) ~
        paste0('<a href="abstracts/virus-toolkit-hackathon.html">', Title, '</a>'),
      TRUE ~ as.character(Title)
    )
  ) %>%
  dplyr::select(Time, Event, Speaker, Topic, Title)

# Count rows for each day
day1_count <- sum(data$Day == 1, na.rm = TRUE)
day2_count <- sum(data$Day == 2, na.rm = TRUE)

# Create the table
table_data %>%
  kableExtra::kbl(escape = FALSE, align = "rlccl", table.attr = 'class="schedule-table table-responsive"')  %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive")) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "15%", extra_css = "padding-right: 10px; white-space: nowrap;") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "20%", extra_css = "padding-right: 10px;") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "15%", extra_css = "padding-right: 10px;") %>%
  column_spec(4, width = "15%", extra_css = "padding-right: 10px;") %>%
  column_spec(5, width = "35%", extra_css = "word-wrap: break-word; overflow-wrap: break-word;") %>%
  kableExtra::pack_rows(index = setNames(c(day1_count, day2_count), c("Monday", "Tuesday")),
              label_row_css = "border-bottom: 2px solid #000000;")



```
